description:
`addTriggerAction` is similar to `attachAction` as it attaches action to a
trigger, but it also registers the action, if it has not been registered, yet.
children.label: addTriggerAction

description: Removes all registered triggers and actions.
children.label: clear

description:
"Fork" a separate instance of `UiActionsService` that inherits all existing
triggers and actions, but going forward all new triggers and actions added
to this instance of `UiActionsService` are only available within this instance.
children.label: fork

functions.label: buildContextMenuForActions
description: Transforms an array of Actions to the shape EuiContextMenuPanel expects.

children.label: order
description:
Determined the order when there is more than one action matched to a trigger.
Higher numbers are displayed first.

children.label: id
description: A unique identifier for this action instance.

children.label: type
description: The action type is what determines the context shape.

children.label: getIconType
description: Optional EUI icon type that can be displayed along with the title.

children.label: getDisplayName
description: Returns a title to be displayed to the user.

children.label: MenuItem
description:
`UiComponent` to render when displaying this action as a context menu item.
If not provided, `getDisplayName` will be used instead.

children.label: isCompatible
description:
Returns a promise that resolves to true if this action is compatible given the context,
otherwise resolves to false.

children.label: execute
description: Executes the action.

children.label: getHref
description:
This method should return a link if this item can be clicked on. The link
is used to navigate user if user middle-clicks it or Ctrl + clicks or
right-clicks and selects "Open in new tab".

children.label: shouldAutoExecute
description:
Determines if action should be executed automatically,
without first showing up in context menu.
false by default.

interfaces.label: ActionDefinition
description: A convenience interface used to register an action.

children.label: id
description: ID of the action that uniquely identifies this action in the actions registry.

children.label: type
description: ID of the factory for this action. Used to construct dynamic actions.

children.label: isCompatible
description:
Returns a promise that resolves to true if this item is compatible given
the context and should be displayed to user, otherwise resolves to false.

children.label: execute
description: Executes the action.

children.label: shouldAutoExecute
description:
Determines if action should be executed automatically,
without first showing up in context menu.
false by default.

children.label: getHref
description:
This method should return a link if this item can be clicked on. The link
is used to navigate user if user middle-clicks it or Ctrl + clicks or
right-clicks and selects "Open in new tab".

interfaces.label: ActionExecutionMeta
description:
During action execution we can provide additional information,
for example, trigger, that caused the action execution

children.label: trigger
description: Trigger that executed the action

interfaces.label: Presentable
description: Represents something that can be displayed to user in UI.

children.label: id
description: ID that uniquely identifies this object.

children.label: order
description:
Determines the display order in relation to other items. Higher numbers are
displayed first.

children.label: MenuItem
description:
`UiComponent` to render when displaying this entity as a context menu item.
If not provided, `getDisplayName` will be used instead.

children.label: getIconType
description: Optional EUI icon type that can be displayed along with the title.

children.label: getDisplayName
description: Returns a title to be displayed to the user.

children.label: getDisplayNameTooltip
description:
Returns tooltip text which should be displayed when user hovers this object.
Should return empty string if tooltip should not be displayed.

children.label: getHref
description:
This method should return a link if this item can be clicked on. The link
is used to navigate user if user middle-clicks it or Ctrl + clicks or
right-clicks and selects "Open in new tab".

children.label: isCompatible
description:
Returns a promise that resolves to true if this item is compatible given
the context and should be displayed to user, otherwise resolves to false.

children.label: grouping
description:
Grouping where this item should appear as a submenu. Each entry is a new
sub-menu level. For example, used to show drilldowns and sharing options
in panel context menu in a sub-menu.

interfaces.label: Trigger
description:
This is a convenience interface used to register a *trigger*.

`Trigger` specifies a named anchor to which `Action` can be attached. When
`Trigger` is being *called* it creates a `Context` object and passes it to
the `execute` method of an `Action`.

More than one action can be attached to a single trigger, in which case when
trigger is *called* it first displays a context menu for user to pick a
single action to execute.

children.label: id
description: Unique name of the trigger as identified in `ui_actions` plugin trigger registry.

children.label: title
description: User friendly name of the trigger.

children.label: description
description: A longer user friendly description of the trigger.

children.label: triggerToActions
description: A 1-to-N mapping from `Trigger` to zero or more `Action`.

misc.label: ActionExecutionContext
description: Action methods are executed with Context from trigger + {@link ActionExecutionMeta}
